import React, {Component} from 'react'; import { allpost, isAuthenciate, read } from '../auth/index'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; class Home extends Component{ constructor() { super(); this.state = { post: [] } } Capitalize(str){ return str.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + str.slice(1); } componentDidMount() { allpost().then(data => { if(data.error) { console.log(data.error); }else { this.setState({ post: data }); } }); } renderPost = post => (
{ post.map((post, i) => (
{post.postedBy && post.postedBy.name ? post.postedBy.name : 'Name' }

(i.target.src = 'https://mdbootstrap.com/img/Photos/Horizontal/Food/full page/2.jpg')} alt="Card image cap" />
12  




))}
) profilecard = user => (

{this.Capitalize(isAuthenciate().user.name)}


); Followcard = () => (

{this.Capitalize(isAuthenciate().user.name)} Follower

); render() { const myContainer = { position: "relative", top: "110px", }; const fixed = { position: "fixed", }; const { post } = this.state; return (
{this.renderPost(post)}
{this.profilecard()} {this.Followcard()}
); } } export default Home;
